oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Naron & Auen notebook, Volume IV. Much personal history and of the inhabitants of the area. Considerable detail as to practises and rituals, especially songs and dances and work hunting and looking for veldkos. There are also detailed descriptions of healing rituals, sorcery or doctoring, beliefs about and prayers to the moon, and about ghosts (or ||gauwa). Recordings ( ediphones ) are mentioned. Much about artefacts made and daily life especially the finding and pursuing of food, making poisons and medicines and what is done with skins.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dorothea Bleek
Book BC151_A3_016
